description:
Aggregate Extra Specs Filter should return if extra_specs is empty. Aggregate Extra Specs Filter checks if extra specs attribute
is present as part of filter_properties; if it is not the filter doesn't proceed further. But the filter tries to proceed further even
if the extra_specs attribute is present but its empty which should not be done. This patch tries to fix the scenario where 'extra_specs' is empty.
title: Aggregate Extra Specs Filter should return if extra_specs is empty

if the extra_specs attribute is present but its empty which should not be done. This patch tries to fix the scenario where 'extra_specs' is empty.

commit ab82413f26c473628fc1babbd5b3b4c20142c410
Author: Vilobh Meshram <email address hidden>
Date:   Mon Nov 2 14:56:59 2015 -0800

    Aggregate Extra Specs Filter should return if extra_specs is empty
    
    Aggregate Extra Specs Filter should return if extra_specs is
    empty. Aggregate Extra Specs Filter checks if extra specs attribute
    is present as part of filter_properties; if it is not the filter
    doesn't proceed further. But the filter tries to proceed further even
    if the extra_specs attribute is present but its empty which should
    not be done. This patch tries to fix the scenario where 'extra_specs'
    is empty.
    
    Change-Id: I23de8f5f45416c81e36e19bafb41e8c66c2ebd5c
    Closes-Bug: #1512511
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: This issue was fixed in the openstack/nova 13.0.0.0b1 development milestone.
